divs: sighting detailsat five minutes to new year 1999, on the farm, i was talking with my cousins​​, when my father and my uncle went screaming and running between sitting, the whole family (about 40 people), and initially we were surprised to see the sky, a great light moving slowly in a cloud, then this came out of the cloud, when we were surprised that it was a giant plate of one mile in diameter with dark windows all around, which fell to 25 ml \ h approximately (very slow), i gather it prepared to land and actually realizing that it would be a close encounter of the third kind, the bones in my knees trembled as ever and i screamed! corran a flying saucer! for the rest come see the full moon shining so perfectly, i turned to see the lights behind the windows and doors open where he was and if he was to leave the landing gear, but this was stabilized as 300ft, a beam of light that i shine and a spray of stars coming out the back quietly, my brother and cousin and i jumped the fence and ran toward him, but i thought we might do something wrong and stopping my brother shouted stop, ran some more and stopped, the ufo continued its path until it disappeared slowly southward, made ​​a representation of what we saw all, many fell to the ground crying and scared printing and other tremble with fright and excitement. no matter what they say, i already know that they exist and they are ... please tell me what you think...
Summary: Giant Frisbee with detailed windows, front and directed light trail of stars falling from behind the clouds came and addressed us
